code:
module TopModule (
    input logic [255:0] in,
    input logic [7:0] sel,
    output logic out
);

    always @(*) begin
        if (sel <= 8'd255) begin
            out = in[sel];
        end else begin
            out = 1'b0; // Default case for out-of-bounds sel
        end
    end

endmodule
